inclusion.criterion: Histologic documentation of invasive adenocarcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: One of the breast disease stages listed below:
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known definitive clinical or radiologic evidence of metastatic disease

exclusion.criterion: T4 tumors including inflammatory breast cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Clinical nodal staging of N2 or N3 disease
exclusion.label: triggers
